DOC.brief_summary: RATIONALE : New image procedure spiral CT may improve ability detect lung cancer patient high risk disease . PURPOSE : Randomized clinical trial compare effectiveness spiral CT scan chest x-ray detecting lung cancer patient high risk disease .
DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : I . Compare efficacy screen spiral CT scan screen chest x-ray detecting lung cancer current former smoker high risk lung cancer . OUTLINE : This randomize , multicenter study lung cancer screening . Patients randomize one two screening arm . Arm I : Patients undergo one spiral CT scan . Arm II : Patients undergo one chest x-ray . Patients primary care physician notify test result within 3 week exam . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : A total 3,000 participant ( 1,500 per screen arm ) accrue study six screening center ( 500 per center ) October 31 , 2000 .
